title: Cover Cropping Techniques - Ol' Turtle Farm Easthampton MA

tasks.task: Managing Cover Crops and Soil Fertility on a Vegetable Farm
subtasks: Planning and rotating cover crops on 146 CSA shares
Using permanent bed system to maintain soil health and reduce compaction
Planting rye and vetch cover crop in August using a drop seeder
Controlling weeds mechanically with a basket weeder attachment
Timing seeding for maximum biomass production of sudex (Sorghum-Sudangrass)
Inoculating legumes before planting to fix nitrogen
Alternating nitrogen-fixing legumes (red clover, vetch) with winter-kill crops (oats, peas)
Rotational grazing layers (chickens) on cover crops for bug control and fertility
Creating habitat diversity by interplanting cover crops with cash crops
